stories.text:
This post [1], apparently, was quickly flagged and taken down. I only found it because of the feed on The Brutalist Report [2]. It led to this silly little website [3].

I am sure that this deserved to be taken down and was a clear violation of the rules and/or culture here, do not want to say anything otherwise. I just thought it was enjoyable and a kind cathartic thing, and I realize that, while it has no place in the professional world of HN (presumably), I wish I knew of a place like HN where this kind of stuff was ok. Does that exist? A HN with maybe more workers than bosses/founders, with a wider threshold for maybe critical and/or silly writing, that's still in the general world of tech.

1. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31424170

2. https://brutalist.report/

3. https://limadrive.com/assessment/
